body_html:
That's an issue with your CUDA install: cuBLAS is not in your library path. If you are on Linux, you should set up your LD_LIBRARY_PATH properly, e.g. like this (depending on where you installed CUDA 9):

export CUDA_HOME=/usr/local/cuda/
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:$CUDA_HOME/lib64:$CUDA_HOME/extras/CUPTI/lib64"
body_text:
That's an issue with your CUDA install: cuBLAS is not in your library path. If you are on Linux, you should set up your LD_LIBRARY_PATH properly, e.g. like this (depending on where you installed CUDA 9):
export CUDA_HOME=/usr/local/cuda/
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:$CUDA_HOME/lib64:$CUDA_HOME/extras/CUPTI/lib64"
body:
That's an issue with your CUDA install: cuBLAS is not in your library path. If you are on Linux, you should set up your `LD_LIBRARY_PATH` properly, e.g. like this (depending on where you installed CUDA 9):
```
export CUDA_HOME=/usr/local/cuda/
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:$CUDA_HOME/lib64:$CUDA_HOME/extras/CUPTI/lib64"
```
